import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { AiOutlineClose, AiOutlineMenu, AiOutlineShoppingCart } from "react-icons/ai"; // Importamos el ícono del carrito const Navbar = () => { const [nav, setNav] = useState(false); const handleNav = () => { setNav(!nav); }; return (

  • Carrito

{nav ? ( ) : ( )}

); }; export default Navbar;
